## Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've formed genuine connections with many of you while playing a thoughtful game. I never targeted anyone without strategic reason, and I've been transparent about my thinking.

I believe I've earned my place here through balanced gameplay - forming alliances when needed while making independent decisions. I respect P5 as a worthy opponent, but I hope you'll recognize my journey to this point required both social awareness and strategic thinking.

I'd be honored to have your vote as the winner of this elimination game.
